forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West wind 15 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 53. West southwest wind 5 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
This afternoon in Downtown San Francisco unfolds under a comforting blanket of sunshine, though the high of 66 will gently drift to 63 as the day wanes. A sturdy west wind brushes through the city, flinging a coolness that mingles with the bright warmth of the sun, invigorating the air with an energetic flair. Those venturing outside will find the skyline sharply defined against a pale blue canvas, hinting at the distant expanse of the Pacific. While the marine layer lurks just beyond the Golden Gate, casting a subtle haze over the waters, the urban landscape glimmers in its clarity, inviting exploration.

As evening approaches, expect the sky to soften into a tapestry of partly cloudy hues, with temperatures settling into the mid-50s. Light, playful winds will continue to dance about, making it wise to layer clothing for the coolness that descends with the night. A comfortable cardigan or light jacket may be your faithful companion, perfect for an evening stroll through the vibrant streets or a quiet sit at a café, savoring the last glimpses of daylight. This delightful weather offers a rare opportunity to engage with the city—perhaps by meandering along the Embarcadero or indulging in a leisurely book in a sun-dappled park, as the aesthetics of the day beckon anyone willing to answer their call.
